name: Sheepocalypse: Sheep Arena
description:
Fight for your life in the sheep arena!

Hordes of zombie sheep attack you, and you must defend yourself with just your trusty SMG. When you die, your score (sheep killed) is added to the global leaderboard. Are you good enough to be top?

This is a version of my Sheepocalypse game, which will include this and a full campaign. It is coming soon (well fairly soon).

Sheepocalypse is an FPS game with no budget (£0) developed by one person. Follow on Instagram here.

64 bit Windows required.
